data.name: ConnectionStringInvalid
data.value: Cannot connect to the database. Please check your server name, database name, username, and password.

data.name: ConnectionStringNotSet
data.value: Database connection string is not set or invalid. Go to Settings → Database Connection to set it up.

data.name: DatabaseConnectionFailed
data.value: Failed to connect to the database. Contact the administrator to resolve the issue.

data.name: ERROR_CAPTION_TEXT_EMPTY
data.value: Please enter a valid caption. The caption text cannot be empty or longer than 30 characters .

data.name: ERROR_END_VALUE_OUT_OF_RANGE
data.value: Please enter a valid end value. It must be between {0} and {1}

data.name: ERROR_ORDER_VALUE_OUT_OF_RANGE
data.value: Please enter a valid order value. The value must be between 1 and {0}.

data.name: ERROR_QUESTION_TEXT_EMPTY
data.value: Please enter a valid question. The question text cannot be empty or longer than 60 characters.

data.name: ERROR_SMILEY_COUNT_INVALID
data.value: Please enter a valid smiley count. The value must be between 2 and 5.

data.name: ERROR_STARS_COUNT_INVALID
data.value: Please enter a valid stars count. The value must be between 1 and 10.

data.name: ERROR_START_VALUE_OUT_OF_RANGE
data.value: Please enter a valid start value. It must be between 0 and {0}
